metadata.synopsis: Vignette: Sobering Up AD. Two guards for the counting house talking outside the blushing mermaid. Guard 1 got hammered during her lunch break aand guard 2 is freaking out - knowing that they're going to get in trouble for going to a pub on shift.

0.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
0.text: How much did you drink, you idiot dokal?
0.context:
NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled
dokaal - DO-khal (like a throat clear at the end) - meaning 'two-legger' (aka humanoid)

2.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
2.text: Just - just a bitta beer. And wine. And mead.

1.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
1.text: We have to go back to the Counting House! What were you thinking?!
1.context: NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled

7.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
7.text: Ah, don't be a dry-shite. No one will... will... yeah.
7.context: NodeContext: was trying to say 'no-one will notice' but forgot the sentence halfway through.

8.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
8.text: Could you at least try to stand up straight.
8.context: NodeContext: trying not to lose his temper with his drunk friend (and failing)

6.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
6.text: I am! Oh - oh, that was a bad idea.
6.context: NodeContext: tries to stand up straight and very quickly feels like she's gonna puke (absolutely hammered)

3.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
3.text: Don't you dare puke on your uniform.

10.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
10.text: You - you want a drink? Let's get one for the road.
10.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered, can't see why her friend is freaking out about her being drunk on shift

4.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
4.text: No, you moron. We could be fired for this!
4.context: NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled

9.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
9.text: Ah, sure, a bitta drink never killed anyone.
9.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered, can't see why her friend is freaking out about her being drunk on shift

5.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
5.text: Tell that to Glitterbeard! He'll have our heads.
5.context: NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled
